cmp: 卷 (to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on, coil/to roll, chapter/examination paper)
mng: circle, ring, loop, classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc, to surround, to circle
to confine, to lock up, to pen in

exm.mng: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
to rotate, to twirl, to run around, to encircle, rotation, (coll.) to speak indirectly, to beat about the bush
rim of the eye, eye socket
